text: Arab Americans are Americans who have Arab ancestory. There over 2 million Arab Americans. Most Arab Americans live in Michigan, New York, California, Florida, and Texas. At least 1.6% of people in Michigan are Arab Americans. According to the Arab American Institute, 63% of Arab Americans are Christians, 24% are Muslim, and 13% follow other religions or are not religious. == Notable people == File:E.J.Coreyx240.jpg|Elias James Corey, winner of the 1990 Nobel Prize in Chemistry. File:Yaghi3.jpg|Omar M. Yaghi, chemist. File:Tony Shalhoub 2017 (cropped).jpg|Tony Shalhoub, actor. File:Kahlil Gibran 1913.jpg|Kahlil Gibran, writer and poet. File:Rashida Tlaib, official portrait, 116th Congress.jpg|Rashida Tlaib, politician. title: Arab Americans
